trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Kelowna
There were no other sightings in Kelowna on or around August 18th 2009
Summary: 2 bright orange object from the south west heading north east
divs: Sighting DetailsWhile trying to fix my telescope on the ring nebulae, I took my eye off the eyepiece and looked up @ the south west sky. Two very bright orange objects moving very slow almost as if decending. within milliseconds of first seeing they were both moving faster north east not far from eachother. I scrambled to set my scope on any of the 2, I managed to get one object in my scope. I tracked it for approx 4 sec than I moved it ahead to maybe catch the second one. the object never re-appeared ahead of itself where I had my scope fixed. I looked up and they were both gone. I couldnt make out any significant detail on the object. it wasn't as bright in the telescope. I knew right away that they were not stars or satellites. I held my breathe during most of the sighting. Very interesting night.
